items.text: In earlier versions of Android, accepting potentially dangerous permission groups was an all-or-nothing affair.
items.href: Guide to Android App Permissions & How to Use Them Smartly | AVG

items.text: You either allowed all permissions an app needed to function — before installation — or you declined them all, which meant you couldn’t install the app.
items.href: Guide to Android App Permissions & How to Use Them Smartly | AVG

items.text: Now Android allows you to decide which permissions to accept on a case-by-case basis — after the app is installed.
items.href: Guide to Android App Permissions & How to Use Them Smartly | AVG
